snippet.title: Guilty Gear -Strive- Ultimate Edition Exclusive Bonus "Digital Soundtrack" Preview Trailer
snippet.description:
■Official website: https://www.guiltygear.com/ggst/en/buynow/
This trailer introduces the tracklist for the Guilty Gear -Strive- Ultimate Edition bonus, the Digital Soundtrack.

■About the Digital Soundtrack
This extensive soundtrack includes over 55 songs in total, from the over 15 vocal themes such as "Smell of the Game," to more than 40 songs used as BGM in the Story Mode.

You must transfer the songs to an external storage device such as a USB drive to play them.

localized.title: Guilty Gear -Strive- Ultimate Edition Exclusive Bonus "Digital Soundtrack" Preview Trailer
localized.description:
■Official website: https://www.guiltygear.com/ggst/en/buynow/
This trailer introduces the tracklist for the Guilty Gear -Strive- Ultimate Edition bonus, the Digital Soundtrack.

■About the Digital Soundtrack
This extensive soundtrack includes over 55 songs in total, from the over 15 vocal themes such as "Smell of the Game," to more than 40 songs used as BGM in the Story Mode.

You must transfer the songs to an external storage device such as a USB drive to play them.
